<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t lhsSext = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64</a>(U.VAL, BitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t rhsSext = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.U.VAL, BitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsSext &lt; rhsSext ? -1 : lhsSext &gt; rhsSext;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsNeg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsNeg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.isNegative();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the sign bits don&#39;t match, then (LHS &lt; RHS) if LHS is negative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsNeg != rhsNeg)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsNeg ? -1 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise we can just use an unsigned comparison, because even negative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// numbers compare correctly this way if both have the same signed-ness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9">tcCompare</a>(U.pVal, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.U.pVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> APInt::setBitsSlowCase(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> loBit, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hiBit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> loWord = whichWord(loBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hiWord = whichWord(hiBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create an initial mask for the low word with zeros below loBit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t loMask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &lt;&lt; whichBit(loBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If hiBit is not aligned, we need a high mask.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hiShiftAmt = whichBit(hiBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (hiShiftAmt != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a high mask with zeros above hiBit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t hiMask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - hiShiftAmt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If loWord and hiWord are equal, then we combine the masks. Otherwise,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// set the bits in hiWord.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (hiWord == loWord)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">      loMask &amp;= hiMask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">      U.pVal&#91;hiWord&#93; |= hiMask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Apply the mask to the low word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">  U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; |= loMask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fill any words between loWord and hiWord with all ones.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> word = loWord + 1; word &lt; hiWord; ++word)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.pVal&#91;word&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Complement a bignum in-place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340" lineLink="#a7b409aa866bfa91f29f51fd35bb56003"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a7b409aa866bfa91f29f51fd35bb56003">tcComplement</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; i++)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    dst&#91;i&#93; = ~dst&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Concatenate the bits from &quot;NewLSB&quot; onto the bottom of &#42;this.  This is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="comment">///   (this-&gt;zext(NewWidth) &lt;&lt; NewLSB.getBitWidth()) | NewLSB.zext(NewWidth)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In the slow case, we know the result is large.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> APInt::concatSlowCase(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;NewLSB)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewWidth = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>() + NewLSB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Toggle a given bit to its opposite value whose position is given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as &quot;bitPosition&quot;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Toggles a given bit to its opposite value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad8466cf860f0a86eee4694fc5c097f44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad8466cf860f0a86eee4694fc5c097f44">APInt::flipBit</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> bitPosition) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af5f9dd7fb931d5c71749761348534109">setBitVal</a>(bitPosition, !(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)&#91;bitPosition&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aabe301a4f18d38478700ad44ba2245bc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aabe301a4f18d38478700ad44ba2245bc">APInt::insertBits</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;subBits, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> bitPosition) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> subBitWidth = subBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((subBitWidth + bitPosition) &lt;= BitWidth &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Illegal bit insertion&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserting no bits is a noop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (subBitWidth == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insertion is a direct copy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (subBitWidth == BitWidth) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> = subBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Single word result can be done as a direct bitmask.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - subBitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.VAL &amp;= ~(mask &lt;&lt; bitPosition);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.VAL |= (subBits.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab82287ee9a2442bc0b6025a9936c88dc">VAL</a> &lt;&lt; bitPosition);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> loBit = whichBit(bitPosition);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> loWord = whichWord(bitPosition);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hi1Word = whichWord(bitPosition + subBitWidth - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insertion within a single word can be done as a direct bitmask.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (loWord == hi1Word) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - subBitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; &amp;= ~(mask &lt;&lt; loBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; |= (subBits.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab82287ee9a2442bc0b6025a9936c88dc">VAL</a> &lt;&lt; loBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert on word boundaries.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (loBit == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Direct copy whole words.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> numWholeSubWords = subBitWidth / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(U.pVal + loWord, subBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ada7af1de63a848b2f452d63958de39fe">getRawData</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">           numWholeSubWords &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask+insert remaining bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> remainingBits = subBitWidth % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (remainingBits != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - remainingBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">      U.pVal&#91;hi1Word&#93; &amp;= ~mask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">      U.pVal&#91;hi1Word&#93; |= subBits.getWord(subBitWidth - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// General case - set/clear individual bits in dst based on src.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO - there is scope for optimization here, but at the moment this code</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// path is barely used so prefer readability over performance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != subBitWidth; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af5f9dd7fb931d5c71749761348534109">setBitVal</a>(bitPosition + i, subBits&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a369007fafbf2f88498f412f00eb0a469"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aabe301a4f18d38478700ad44ba2245bc">APInt::insertBits</a>(uint64&#95;t subBits, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> bitPosition, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> numBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t maskBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79dff91526e31b1a05f59eed6c189eb4">maskTrailingOnes&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(numBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  subBits &amp;= maskBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(8 &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>) &lt;= 64, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;This code assumes only two words affected&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> wordBits = 8 &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// General case - shift + copy source words directly into place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> Result(numBits, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSrcWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t &#42;DestPtr = Result.isSingleWord() ? &amp;Result.U.VAL : Result.U.pVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> word = 0; word &lt; NumDstWords; ++word) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a31665d34f2904bf73a6dd6419dcd8587"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a31665d34f2904bf73a6dd6419dcd8587">APInt::getSufficientBitsNeeded</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, uint8&#95;t Radix) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Str.empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid string length&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StrLen = Str.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each computation below needs to know if it&#39;s negative.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsNegative = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Str&#91;0&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || Str&#91;0&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;+&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">    IsNegative = Str&#91;0&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">    StrLen--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StrLen &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;String is only a sign, needs a value.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For radixes of power-of-two values, the bits required is accurately and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// easily computed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Radix == 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StrLen + IsNegative;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Radix == 8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StrLen &#42; 3 + IsNegative;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Radix == 16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StrLen &#42; 4 + IsNegative;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute a sufficient number of bits that is always large enough but might</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be too large. This avoids the assertion in the constructor. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calculation doesn&#39;t work appropriately for the numbers 0-9, so just use 4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bits in that case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Radix == 10)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StrLen == 1 ? 4 : StrLen &#42; 64 / 18) + IsNegative;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Radix == 36);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StrLen == 1 ? 7 : StrLen &#42; 16 / 3) + IsNegative;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab9178a079b54667289f598db5b052ade"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab9178a079b54667289f598db5b052ade">APInt::getBitsNeeded</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> str, uint8&#95;t radix) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute a sufficient number of bits that is always large enough but might</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be too large.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> sufficient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a31665d34f2904bf73a6dd6419dcd8587">getSufficientBitsNeeded</a>(str, radix);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For bases 2, 8, and 16, the sufficient number of bits is exact and we can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// return the value directly. For bases 10 and 36, we need to do extra work.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (radix == 2 || radix == 8 || radix == 16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> sufficient;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is grossly inefficient but accurate. We could probably do something</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with a computation of roughly slen&#42;64/20 and then adjust by the value of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the first few digits. But, I&#39;m not sure how accurate that could be.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> slen = str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each computation below needs to know if it&#39;s negative.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a20d37563688a61a452fb26e317e37308">StringRef::iterator</a> p = str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a46f643f1eb1939362c7dd79361bcbd0e">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a> = &#42;p == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;p == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || &#42;p == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;+&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">    p++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">    slen--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(slen &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;String is only a sign, needs a value.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convert to the actual binary value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> tmp(sufficient, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>(p, slen), radix);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute how many bits are required. If the log is infinite, assume we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// just bit. If the log is exact and value is negative, then the value is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MinSignedValue with (log + 1) bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> log = tmp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aae3b959a0a2981340fd03c29f528f2f0">logBase2</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (log == (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)-1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a> + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a> &amp;&amp; tmp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad1b0513de876d1c85cf6268ca21b2c86">isPowerOf2</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a> + log;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a> + log + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return a value containing V broadcasted over NewLen bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BitWidth &lt;= 64) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Tmp1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2a584ab307c8e962527df226089a7470">llvm::byteswap&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(U.VAL);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Result.BitWidth != BitWidth) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result.lshrInPlace(Result.BitWidth - BitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result.BitWidth = BitWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; Val != 0; Val.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af338e23a90c301183968435e80cd6a27">lshrInPlace</a>(1)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
