<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = n; i &gt; 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; v&#91;i - 1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D1. &#91;Normalize.&#93; Set d = b / (v&#91;n-1&#93; + 1) and multiply all the digits of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// u and v by d. Note that we have taken Knuth&#39;s advice here to use a power</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of 2 value for d such that d &#42; v&#91;n-1&#93; &gt;= b/2 (b is the base). A power of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 allows us to shift instead of multiply and it is easy to determine the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shift amount from the leading zeros.  We are basically normalizing the u</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and v so that its high bits are shifted to the top of v&#39;s range without</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// overflow. Note that this can require an extra word in u so that u must</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be of length m+n+1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(v&#91;n - 1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t v&#95;carry = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t u&#95;carry = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (shift) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; m+n; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t u&#95;tmp = u&#91;i&#93; &gt;&gt; (32 - shift);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><Highlight kind="normal">      u&#91;i&#93; = (u&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; shift) | u&#95;carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><Highlight kind="normal">      u&#95;carry = u&#95;tmp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t v&#95;tmp = v&#91;i&#93; &gt;&gt; (32 - shift);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><Highlight kind="normal">      v&#91;i&#93; = (v&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; shift) | v&#95;carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><Highlight kind="normal">      v&#95;carry = v&#95;tmp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><Highlight kind="normal">  u&#91;m+n&#93; = u&#95;carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv:   normal:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = m + n; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; by&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = n; i &gt; 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; v&#91;i - 1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D2. &#91;Initialize j.&#93;  Set j to m. This is the loop counter over the places.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = m;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: quotient digit #&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; j &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D3. &#91;Calculate q&#39;.&#93;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Set qp = (u&#91;j+n&#93;&#42;b + u&#91;j+n-1&#93;) / v&#91;n-1&#93;. (qp=qprime=q&#39;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Set rp = (u&#91;j+n&#93;&#42;b + u&#91;j+n-1&#93;) % v&#91;n-1&#93;. (rp=rprime=r&#39;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now test if qp == b or qp&#42;v&#91;n-2&#93; &gt; b&#42;rp + u&#91;j+n-2&#93;; if so, decrease</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// qp by 1, increase rp by v&#91;n-1&#93;, and repeat this test if rp &lt; b. The test</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on v&#91;n-2&#93; determines at high speed most of the cases in which the trial</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value qp is one too large, and it eliminates all cases where qp is two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// too large.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t dividend = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(u&#91;j+n&#93;, u&#91;j+n-1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: dividend == &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; dividend &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t qp = dividend / v&#91;n-1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t rp = dividend % v&#91;n-1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (qp == b || qp&#42;v&#91;n-2&#93; &gt; b&#42;rp + u&#91;j+n-2&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><Highlight kind="normal">      qp--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">      rp += v&#91;n-1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (rp &lt; b &amp;&amp; (qp == b || qp&#42;v&#91;n-2&#93; &gt; b&#42;rp + u&#91;j+n-2&#93;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">        qp--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: qp == &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; qp &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, rp == &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; rp &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D4. &#91;Multiply and subtract.&#93; Replace (u&#91;j+n&#93;u&#91;j+n-1&#93;...u&#91;j&#93;) with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (u&#91;j+n&#93;u&#91;j+n-1&#93;..u&#91;j&#93;) - qp &#42; (v&#91;n-1&#93;...v&#91;1&#93;v&#91;0&#93;). This computation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// consists of a simple multiplication by a one-place number, combined with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a subtraction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The digits (u&#91;j+n&#93;...u&#91;j&#93;) should be kept positive; if the result of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this step is actually negative, (u&#91;j+n&#93;...u&#91;j&#93;) should be left as the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// true value plus b&#42;&#42;(n+1), namely as the b&#39;s complement of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the true value, and a &quot;borrow&quot; to the left should be remembered.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t borrow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t p = uint64&#95;t(qp) &#42; uint64&#95;t(v&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><Highlight kind="normal">      int64&#95;t subres = int64&#95;t(u&#91;j+i&#93;) - borrow - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><Highlight kind="normal">      u&#91;j+i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(subres);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><Highlight kind="normal">      borrow = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(p) - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(subres);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: u&#91;j+i&#93; = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;j + i&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, borrow = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; borrow &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> = u&#91;j+n&#93; &lt; borrow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><Highlight kind="normal">    u&#91;j+n&#93; -= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(borrow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: after subtraction:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = m + n; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D5. &#91;Test remainder.&#93; Set q&#91;j&#93; = qp. If the result of step D4 was</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// negative, go to step D6; otherwise go on to step D7.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><Highlight kind="normal">    q&#91;j&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(qp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D6. &#91;Add back&#93;. The probability that this step is necessary is very</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// small, on the order of only 2/b. Make sure that test data accounts for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this possibility. Decrease q&#91;j&#93; by 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><Highlight kind="normal">      q&#91;j&#93;--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and add (0v&#91;n-1&#93;...v&#91;1&#93;v&#91;0&#93;) to (u&#91;j+n&#93;u&#91;j+n-1&#93;...u&#91;j+1&#93;u&#91;j&#93;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A carry will occur to the left of u&#91;j+n&#93;, and it should be ignored</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since it cancels with the borrow that occurred in D4.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> carry = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint32&#95;t limit = std::min(u&#91;j+i&#93;,v&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><Highlight kind="normal">        u&#91;j+i&#93; += v&#91;i&#93; + carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal">        carry = u&#91;j+i&#93; &lt; limit || (carry &amp;&amp; u&#91;j+i&#93; == limit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><Highlight kind="normal">      u&#91;j+n&#93; += carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: after correction:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = m + n; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\nKnuthDiv: digit result = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; q&#91;j&#93; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D7. &#91;Loop on j.&#93;  Decrease j by one. Now if j &gt;= 0, go back to D3.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (--j &gt;= 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: quotient:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// D8. &#91;Unnormalize&#93;. Now q&#91;...&#93; is the desired quotient, and the desired</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// remainder may be obtained by dividing u&#91;...&#93; by d. If r is non-null we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// compute the remainder (urem uses this).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (r) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The value d is expressed by the &quot;shift&quot; value above since we avoided</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiplication by d by using a shift left. So, all we have to do is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shift right here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (shift) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t carry = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: remainder:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = n-1; i &gt;= 0; i--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><Highlight kind="normal">        r&#91;i&#93; = (u&#91;i&#93; &gt;&gt; shift) | carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><Highlight kind="normal">        carry = u&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; (32 - shift);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; r&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = n-1; i &gt;= 0; i--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><Highlight kind="normal">        r&#91;i&#93; = u&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; r&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> APInt::divide(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsWords, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsWords, WordType &#42;Quotient, WordType &#42;Remainder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(lhsWords &gt;= rhsWords &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Fractional result&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, compose the values into an array of 32-bit words instead of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 64-bit words. This is a necessity of both the &quot;short division&quot; algorithm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and the Knuth &quot;classical algorithm&quot; which requires there to be native</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations for +, -, and &#42; on an m bit value with an m&#42;2 bit result. We</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can&#39;t use 64-bit operands here because we don&#39;t have native results of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 128-bits. Furthermore, casting the 64-bit values to 32-bit values won&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// work on large-endian machines.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = rhsWords &#42; 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> m = (lhsWords &#42; 2) - n;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Allocate space for the temporary values we need either on the stack, if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it will fit, or on the heap if it won&#39;t.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t SPACE&#91;128&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t &#42;U = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t &#42;Q = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Remainder?4:3)&#42;n+2&#42;m+1 &lt;= 128) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">    U = &amp;SPACE&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = &amp;SPACE&#91;m+n+1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">    Q = &amp;SPACE&#91;(m+n+1) + n&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Remainder)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = &amp;SPACE&#91;(m+n+1) + n + (m+n)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">    U = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t&#91;m + n + 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t&#91;n&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal">    Q = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t&#91;m+n&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Remainder)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t&#91;n&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize the dividend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">  memset(U, 0, (m+n+1)&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint32&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; lhsWords; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t tmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">    U&#91;i &#42; 2&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">    U&#91;i &#42; 2 + 1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">  U&#91;m+n&#93; = 0; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this extra word is for &quot;spill&quot; in the Knuth algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize the divisor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">  memset(V, 0, (n)&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint32&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; rhsWords; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t tmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;i &#42; 2&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;i &#42; 2 + 1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// initialize the quotient and remainder</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">  memset(Q, 0, (m+n) &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint32&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Remainder)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="normal">    memset(R, 0, n &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint32&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now, adjust m and n for the Knuth division. n is the number of words in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the divisor. m is the number of words by which the dividend exceeds the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// divisor (i.e. m+n is the length of the dividend). These sizes must not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contain any zero words or the Knuth algorithm fails.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = n; i &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;i-1&#93; == 0; i--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><Highlight kind="normal">    n--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="normal">    m++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = m+n; i &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; U&#91;i-1&#93; == 0; i--)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><Highlight kind="normal">    m--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;re left with only a single word for the divisor, Knuth doesn&#39;t work</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so we implement the short division algorithm here. This is much simpler</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and faster because we are certain that we can divide a 64-bit quantity</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by a 32-bit quantity at hardware speed and short division is simply a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// series of such operations. This is just like doing short division but we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are using base 2^32 instead of base 10</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(n != 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Divide by zero?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t divisor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t remainder = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = m; i &gt;= 0; i--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t partial&#95;dividend = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(remainder, U&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (partial&#95;dividend == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><Highlight kind="normal">        Q&#91;i&#93; = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><Highlight kind="normal">        remainder = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (partial&#95;dividend &lt; divisor) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><Highlight kind="normal">        Q&#91;i&#93; = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><Highlight kind="normal">        remainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(partial&#95;dividend);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (partial&#95;dividend == divisor) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><Highlight kind="normal">        Q&#91;i&#93; = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><Highlight kind="normal">        remainder = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><Highlight kind="normal">        Q&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(partial&#95;dividend / divisor);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><Highlight kind="normal">        remainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(partial&#95;dividend - (Q&#91;i&#93; &#42; divisor));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (R)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>&#91;0&#93; = remainder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now we&#39;re ready to invoke the Knuth classical divide algorithm. In this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case n &gt; 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#af4b80b2d90bc4614ea242503aa88df37">KnuthDiv</a>(U, V, Q, R, m, n);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the caller wants the quotient</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Quotient) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; lhsWords; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><Highlight kind="normal">      Quotient&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(Q&#91;i&#42;2+1&#93;, Q&#91;i&#42;2&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the caller wants the remainder</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Remainder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; rhsWords; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><Highlight kind="normal">      Remainder&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(R&#91;i&#42;2+1&#93;, R&#91;i&#42;2&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clean up the memory we allocated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (U != &amp;SPACE&#91;0&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;&#93; U;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;&#93; Q;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a05d674becc60ba4ef8cd4dd4d38ac27a"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a05d674becc60ba4ef8cd4dd4d38ac27a">APInt::udiv</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;RHS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BitWidth == RHS.BitWidth &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Bit widths must be the same&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, deal with the easy case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RHS.U.VAL != 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Divide by zero?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, U.VAL / RHS.U.VAL);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get some facts about the LHS and RHS number of bits and words</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3015474e70e59c0a3ed4f9f0e8644b75">getActiveBits</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsBits  = RHS.getActiveBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(rhsBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(rhsWords &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Divided by zero???&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Deal with some degenerate cases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!lhsWords)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0 / X ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (rhsBits == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / 1 ===&gt; X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords &lt; rhsWords || this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a545e8d5dfa1688acea0d0e275b03682f">ult</a>(RHS))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / Y ===&gt; 0, iff X &lt; Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> == RHS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / X ===&gt; 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords == 1) </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rhsWords is 1 if lhsWords is 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All high words are zero, just use native divide</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, this-&gt;U.pVal&#91;0&#93; / RHS.U.pVal&#91;0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to compute it the hard way. Invoke the Knuth divide algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> Quotient(BitWidth, 0); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to hold result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><Highlight kind="normal">  divide(U.pVal, lhsWords, RHS.U.pVal, rhsWords, Quotient.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Quotient;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % Y ===&gt; X, iff X &lt; Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a217e0207d9cc8e046c2dccbf0e4bb198">getZExtValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> == RHS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % X == 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All high words are zero, just use native remainder</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U.pVal&#91;0&#93; % RHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to compute it the hard way. Invoke the Knuth divide algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Remainder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><Highlight kind="normal">  divide(U.pVal, lhsWords, &amp;RHS, 1, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &amp;Remainder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Remainder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac131d830427393332e440e1d6e3013b6"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac131d830427393332e440e1d6e3013b6">APInt::srem</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;RHS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RHS.isNegative())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -((-(&#42;this)).urem(-RHS));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -((-(&#42;this)).urem(RHS));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RHS.isNegative())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4e3a2187cacdec76028617a403c47d89">urem</a>(-RHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4e3a2187cacdec76028617a403c47d89">urem</a>(RHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aeee93929dbd2133737e30498d6e12fed"><Highlight kind="normal">int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac131d830427393332e440e1d6e3013b6">APInt::srem</a>(int64&#95;t RHS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -((-(&#42;this)).urem(RHS));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
