<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0f0a665210e453bb16b4bf1861dbdd58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0f0a665210e453bb16b4bf1861dbdd58">APInt::udivrem</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;RHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;Quotient, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;Remainder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LHS.BitWidth == RHS.BitWidth &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Bit widths must be the same&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitWidth = LHS.BitWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, deal with the easy case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.isSingleWord()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RHS.U.VAL != 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Divide by zero?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t QuotVal = LHS.U.VAL / RHS.U.VAL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t RemVal = LHS.U.VAL % RHS.U.VAL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, QuotVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, RemVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get some size facts about the dividend and divisor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(LHS.getActiveBits());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsBits  = RHS.getActiveBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(rhsBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(rhsWords &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Performing divrem operation by zero ???&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check the degenerate cases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0 / Y ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0 % Y ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (rhsBits == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = LHS;                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / 1 ===&gt; X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % 1 ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords &lt; rhsWords || LHS.ult(RHS)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = LHS;                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % Y ===&gt; X, iff X &lt; Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / Y ===&gt; 0, iff X &lt; Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS == RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient  = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 1);   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / X ===&gt; 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % X ===&gt; 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure there is enough space to hold the results.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: This assumes that reallocate won&#39;t affect any bits if it doesn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// change the size. This is necessary if Quotient or Remainder is aliased</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with LHS or RHS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><Highlight kind="normal">  Quotient.reallocate(BitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><Highlight kind="normal">  Remainder.reallocate(BitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords == 1) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rhsWords is 1 if lhsWords is 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is only one word to consider so use the native versions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t lhsValue = LHS.U.pVal&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t rhsValue = RHS.U.pVal&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = lhsValue / rhsValue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = lhsValue % rhsValue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, lets do it the long way</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><Highlight kind="normal">  divide(LHS.U.pVal, lhsWords, RHS.U.pVal, rhsWords, Quotient.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><Highlight kind="normal">         Remainder.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clear the rest of the Quotient and Remainder.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memset(Quotient.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a> + lhsWords, 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><Highlight kind="normal">              (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(BitWidth) - lhsWords) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memset(Remainder.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a> + rhsWords, 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><Highlight kind="normal">              (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(BitWidth) - rhsWords) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd2f21c3219cdb1c83f080dc7e1fc31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0f0a665210e453bb16b4bf1861dbdd58">APInt::udivrem</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;LHS, uint64&#95;t RHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> &amp;Quotient,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><Highlight kind="normal">                    uint64&#95;t &amp;Remainder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RHS != 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Divide by zero?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitWidth = LHS.BitWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, deal with the easy case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.isSingleWord()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t QuotVal = LHS.U.VAL / RHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = LHS.U.VAL % RHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, QuotVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get some size facts about the dividend and divisor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(LHS.getActiveBits());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check the degenerate cases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0 / Y ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = 0;                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0 % Y ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RHS == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = LHS;                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / 1 ===&gt; X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = 0;                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % 1 ===&gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.ult(RHS)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = LHS.getZExtValue();   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % Y ===&gt; X, iff X &lt; Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / Y ===&gt; 0, iff X &lt; Y</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS == RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient  = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 1);   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X / X ===&gt; 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = 0;                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X % X ===&gt; 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure there is enough space to hold the results.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: This assumes that reallocate won&#39;t affect any bits if it doesn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// change the size. This is necessary if Quotient is aliased with LHS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><Highlight kind="normal">  Quotient.reallocate(BitWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsWords == 1) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rhsWords is 1 if lhsWords is 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is only one word to consider so use the native versions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t lhsValue = LHS.U.pVal&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><Highlight kind="normal">    Quotient = lhsValue / RHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><Highlight kind="normal">    Remainder = lhsValue % RHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, lets do it the long way</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><Highlight kind="normal">  divide(LHS.U.pVal, lhsWords, &amp;RHS, 1, Quotient.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>, &amp;Remainder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clear the rest of the Quotient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memset(Quotient.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a> + lhsWords, 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><Highlight kind="normal">              (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(BitWidth) - lhsWords) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> APInt::fromString(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> numbits, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> str, uint8&#95;t radix) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check our assumptions here</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid string length&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((radix == 10 || radix == 8 || radix == 16 || radix == 2 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><Highlight kind="normal">          radix == 36) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2092"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Radix should be 2, 8, 10, 16, or 36!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a20d37563688a61a452fb26e317e37308">StringRef::iterator</a> p = str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a46f643f1eb1939362c7dd79361bcbd0e">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> slen = str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> = &#42;p == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;p == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || &#42;p == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;+&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><Highlight kind="normal">    p++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><Highlight kind="normal">    slen--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(slen &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;String is only a sign, needs a value.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((slen &lt;= numbits || radix != 2) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Insufficient bit width&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((slen-1)&#42;3 &lt;= numbits || radix != 8) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Insufficient bit width&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((slen-1)&#42;4 &lt;= numbits || radix != 16) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Insufficient bit width&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((((slen-1)&#42;64)/22 &lt;= numbits || radix != 10) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Insufficient bit width&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Allocate memory if needed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.VAL = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="normal">    U.pVal = <a href="#af853fcc5930f7653d40c2637dc728bb5">getClearedMemory</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out if we can shift instead of multiply</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shift = (radix == 16 ? 4 : radix == 8 ? 3 : radix == 2 ? 1 : 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Enter digit traversal loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-path-cpp-/stringref/#a20d37563688a61a452fb26e317e37308">StringRef::iterator</a> e = str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a996c7ca3dd6843ba5d55a7c217770270">end</a>(); p != e; ++p) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> digit = <a href="#aced746e8db93cd749b6226df5350cc1d">getDigit</a>(&#42;p, radix);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(digit &lt; radix &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid character in digit string&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift or multiply the value by the radix</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (slen &gt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (shift)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt;= shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;= radix;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Flip the bits and add one to turn it into the equivalent positive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We insert the digits backward, then reverse them to get the right order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartDig = Str.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the 2, 8 and 16 bit cases, we can just shift instead of divide</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because the number of bits per digit (1, 3 and 4 respectively) divides</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// equally.  We just shift until the value is zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Radix == 2 || Radix == 8 || Radix == 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftAmt = (Radix == 16 ? 4 : (Radix == 8 ? 3 : 1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaskAmt = Radix - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InsertSeparators &amp;&amp; Pos % Grouping == 0 &amp;&amp; Pos &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Digit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2257"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0f0a665210e453bb16b4bf1861dbdd58">udivrem</a>(Tmp, Radix, Tmp, Digit);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><Highlight kind="normal">    --n;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (parts&#91;n&#93; != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(parts&#91;n&#93;) &lt;= </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> msb = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">llvm::Log2&#95;64</a>(parts&#91;n&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> msb + n &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UINT&#95;MAX;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2380"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Copy the bit vector of width srcBITS from SRC, starting at bit srcLSB, to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DST, of dstCOUNT parts, such that the bit srcLSB becomes the least</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><Highlight kind="comment">/// significant bit of DST.  All high bits above srcBITS in DST are zero-filled.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2732964a6de928520d3d12be196a7a15"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2732964a6de928520d3d12be196a7a15">APInt::tcExtract</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dstCount, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><Highlight kind="normal">                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> srcBits, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> srcLSB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dstParts = (srcBits + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - 1) / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dstParts &lt;= dstCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> firstSrcPart = srcLSB / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5027d1fc1fcb950cc207e0b39821fd10">tcAssign</a>(dst, src + firstSrcPart, dstParts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shift = srcLSB % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b">tcShiftRight</a>(dst, dstParts, shift);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We now have (dstParts &#42; APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD - shift) bits from SRC</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in DST.  If this is less that srcBits, append the rest, else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// clear the high bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = dstParts &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n &lt; srcBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> mask = <a href="#ae876a1ecb46543fee1f374dd8c2fad13">lowBitMask</a> (srcBits - n);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><Highlight kind="normal">    dst&#91;dstParts - 1&#93; |= ((src&#91;firstSrcPart + dstParts&#93; &amp; mask)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"><Highlight kind="normal">                          &lt;&lt; n % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n &gt; srcBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (srcBits % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><Highlight kind="normal">      dst&#91;dstParts - 1&#93; &amp;= <a href="#ae876a1ecb46543fee1f374dd8c2fad13">lowBitMask</a> (srcBits % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clear high parts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (dstParts &lt; dstCount)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><Highlight kind="normal">    dst&#91;dstParts++&#93; = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><Highlight kind="comment">//// DST += RHS + C where C is zero or one.  Returns the carry flag.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2416" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a25ca60b3924e39b65a173e2b55c6e92d"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a25ca60b3924e39b65a173e2b55c6e92d">APInt::tcAdd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2417"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> c, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2418"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(c &lt;= 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2420"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2421"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> l = dst&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
