<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2426"><Highlight kind="normal">      dst&#91;i&#93; += rhs&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2427"><Highlight kind="normal">      c = (dst&#91;i&#93; &lt; l);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function adds a single &quot;word&quot; integer, src, to the multiple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &quot;word&quot; integer array, dst&#91;&#93;. dst&#91;&#93; is modified to reflect the addition and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 is returned if there is a carry out, otherwise 0 is returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2437"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @returns the carry of the addition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ada4be5a4a886a268b42447b2c17eb59e"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ada4be5a4a886a268b42447b2c17eb59e">APInt::tcAddPart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2439"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><Highlight kind="normal">    dst&#91;i&#93; += src;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (dst&#91;i&#93; &gt;= src)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No need to carry so exit early.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"><Highlight kind="normal">    src = 1; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Carry one to next digit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2449"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DST -= RHS + C where C is zero or one.  Returns the carry flag.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aba546a206fb7cfbc3cc5fd95a832a653"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aba546a206fb7cfbc3cc5fd95a832a653">APInt::tcSubtract</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> c, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(c &lt;= 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> l = dst&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (c) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><Highlight kind="normal">      dst&#91;i&#93; -= rhs&#91;i&#93; + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><Highlight kind="normal">      c = (dst&#91;i&#93; &gt;= l);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><Highlight kind="normal">      dst&#91;i&#93; -= rhs&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><Highlight kind="normal">      c = (dst&#91;i&#93; &gt; l);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function subtracts a single &quot;word&quot; (64-bit word), src, from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the multi-word integer array, dst&#91;&#93;, propagating the borrowed 1 value until</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="comment">/// no further borrowing is needed or it runs out of &quot;words&quot; in dst.  The result</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is 1 if &quot;borrowing&quot; exhausted the digits in dst, or 0 if dst was not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><Highlight kind="comment">/// exhausted. In other words, if src &gt; dst then this function returns 1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="comment">/// otherwise 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @returns the borrow out of the subtraction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97a57add297988a66a8d6a81eff19cbb"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97a57add297988a66a8d6a81eff19cbb">APInt::tcSubtractPart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> Dst = dst&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><Highlight kind="normal">    dst&#91;i&#93; -= src;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (src &lt;= Dst)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No need to borrow so exit early.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"><Highlight kind="normal">    src = 1; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to &quot;borrow 1&quot; from next &quot;word&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2489"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Negate a bignum in-place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#abece2572a121bb1dd2c34621c1e13f76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#abece2572a121bb1dd2c34621c1e13f76">APInt::tcNegate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a7b409aa866bfa91f29f51fd35bb56003">tcComplement</a>(dst, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac5bc4f0b55d702e1f7e5dea17a097e35">tcIncrement</a>(dst, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DST += SRC &#42; MULTIPLIER + CARRY   if add is true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DST  = SRC &#42; MULTIPLIER + CARRY   if add is false</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Requires 0 &lt;= DSTPARTS &lt;= SRCPARTS + 1  If DST overlaps SRC</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><Highlight kind="comment">/// they must start at the same point, i.e. DST == SRC.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If DSTPARTS == SRCPARTS + 1 no overflow occurs and zero is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><Highlight kind="comment">/// returned.  Otherwise DST is filled with the least significant</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DSTPARTS parts of the result, and if all of the omitted higher</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2502"><Highlight kind="comment">/// parts were zero return zero, otherwise overflow occurred and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2503"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678">APInt::tcMultiplyPart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2505"><Highlight kind="normal">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> multiplier, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> carry,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2506"><Highlight kind="normal">                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> srcParts, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dstParts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2507"><Highlight kind="normal">                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> add) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise our writes of DST kill our later reads of SRC.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2509"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dst &lt;= src || dst &gt;= src + srcParts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dstParts &lt;= srcParts + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2511"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2512"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// N loops; minimum of dstParts and srcParts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2513"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = std::min(dstParts, srcParts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2515"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2516"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;LOW, HIGH&#93; = MULTIPLIER &#42; SRC&#91;i&#93; + DST&#91;i&#93; + CARRY.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This cannot overflow, because:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2518"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (n - 1) &#42; (n - 1) + 2 (n - 1) = (n - 1) &#42; (n + 1)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2519"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which is less than n^2.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> srcPart = src&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> low, mid, high;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (multiplier == 0 || srcPart == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><Highlight kind="normal">      low = carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2524"><Highlight kind="normal">      high = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2525"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2526"><Highlight kind="normal">      low = <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(multiplier);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2527"><Highlight kind="normal">      high = <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(multiplier);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2528"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2529"><Highlight kind="normal">      mid = <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(multiplier);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2530"><Highlight kind="normal">      high += <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(mid);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2531"><Highlight kind="normal">      mid &lt;&lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2532"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (low + mid &lt; low)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2533"><Highlight kind="normal">        high++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2534"><Highlight kind="normal">      low += mid;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2535"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2536"><Highlight kind="normal">      mid = <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(multiplier);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><Highlight kind="normal">      high += <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(mid);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"><Highlight kind="normal">      mid &lt;&lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2539"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (low + mid &lt; low)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2540"><Highlight kind="normal">        high++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2541"><Highlight kind="normal">      low += mid;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2543"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now add carry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2544"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (low + carry &lt; low)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2545"><Highlight kind="normal">        high++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2546"><Highlight kind="normal">      low += carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2547"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2548"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2549"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (add) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2550"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// And now DST&#91;i&#93;, and store the new low part there.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2551"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (low + dst&#91;i&#93; &lt; low)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2552"><Highlight kind="normal">        high++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2553"><Highlight kind="normal">      dst&#91;i&#93; += low;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2554"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2555"><Highlight kind="normal">      dst&#91;i&#93; = low;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2556"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2557"><Highlight kind="normal">    carry = high;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2558"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (srcParts &lt; dstParts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2561"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Full multiplication, there is no overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2562"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(srcParts + 1 == dstParts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2563"><Highlight kind="normal">    dst&#91;srcParts&#93; = carry;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2564"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2565"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2566"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2567"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We overflowed if there is carry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (carry)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2569"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2570"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2571"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We would overflow if any significant unwritten parts would be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2572"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-zero.  This is true if any remaining src parts are non-zero</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2573"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and the multiplier is non-zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2574"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (multiplier)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2575"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = dstParts; i &lt; srcParts; i++)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (src&#91;i&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2577"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2578"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We fitted in the narrow destination.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2581"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2583"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DST = LHS &#42; RHS, where DST has the same width as the operands and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2584"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is filled with the least significant parts of the result.  Returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><Highlight kind="comment">/// one if overflow occurred, otherwise zero.  DST must be disjoint</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from both operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab153d6d2370c0c5526009aaa07cc00e1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab153d6d2370c0c5526009aaa07cc00e1">APInt::tcMultiply</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><Highlight kind="normal">                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dst != lhs &amp;&amp; dst != rhs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> overflow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t accumulate on the first iteration so we don&#39;t need to initalize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dst to 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><Highlight kind="normal">    overflow |=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678">tcMultiplyPart</a>(&amp;dst&#91;i&#93;, lhs, rhs&#91;i&#93;, 0, parts, parts - i, i != 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> overflow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DST = LHS &#42; RHS, where DST has width the sum of the widths of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><Highlight kind="comment">/// operands. No overflow occurs. DST must be disjoint from both operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5442d90b169a8cbe8cfcb8724cf79b14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5442d90b169a8cbe8cfcb8724cf79b14">APInt::tcFullMultiply</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><Highlight kind="normal">                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsParts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><Highlight kind="normal">                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsParts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Put the narrower number on the LHS for less loops below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsParts &gt; rhsParts)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5442d90b169a8cbe8cfcb8724cf79b14">tcFullMultiply</a> (dst, rhs, lhs, rhsParts, lhsParts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dst != lhs &amp;&amp; dst != rhs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2613"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2614"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; lhsParts; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2615"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t accumulate on the first iteration so we don&#39;t need to initalize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2616"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dst to 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2617"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678">tcMultiplyPart</a>(&amp;dst&#91;i&#93;, rhs, lhs&#91;i&#93;, 0, rhsParts, rhsParts + 1, i != 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2618"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2619"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2620"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2621"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If RHS is zero LHS and REMAINDER are left unchanged, return one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2622"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise set LHS to LHS / RHS with the fractional part discarded,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2623"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// set REMAINDER to the remainder, return zero.  i.e.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2624"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2625"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   OLD&#95;LHS = RHS &#42; LHS + REMAINDER</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2626"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2627"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SCRATCH is a bignum of the same size as the operands and result for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2628"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use by the routine; its contents need not be initialized and are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// destroyed.  LHS, REMAINDER and SCRATCH must be distinct.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9fbadc3dfac1d405b669b85267421ca5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9fbadc3dfac1d405b669b85267421ca5">APInt::tcDivide</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;remainder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;srhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><Highlight kind="normal">                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(lhs != remainder &amp;&amp; lhs != srhs &amp;&amp; remainder != srhs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shiftCount = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9f95a75462af1c1bd3a22cf805da64a0">tcMSB</a>(rhs, parts) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (shiftCount == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2639"><Highlight kind="normal">  shiftCount = parts &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - shiftCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = shiftCount / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2641"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> mask = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>) 1 &lt;&lt; (shiftCount % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2642"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2643"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5027d1fc1fcb950cc207e0b39821fd10">tcAssign</a>(srhs, rhs, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2644"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd8fe361c9d102eb08cf77f6e4bfda4">tcShiftLeft</a>(srhs, parts, shiftCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2645"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5027d1fc1fcb950cc207e0b39821fd10">tcAssign</a>(remainder, lhs, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2646"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a082bdaab3ddeb1d8e28759423242e2d5">tcSet</a>(lhs, 0, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2647"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2648"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loop, subtracting SRHS if REMAINDER is greater and adding that to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2649"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// total.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2650"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (;;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2651"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> compare = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9">tcCompare</a>(remainder, srhs, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2652"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (compare &gt;= 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2653"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aba546a206fb7cfbc3cc5fd95a832a653">tcSubtract</a>(remainder, srhs, 0, parts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><Highlight kind="normal">      lhs&#91;n&#93; |= mask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (shiftCount == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2658"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2659"><Highlight kind="normal">    shiftCount--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2660"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b">tcShiftRight</a>(srhs, parts, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2661"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((mask &gt;&gt;= 1) == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2662"><Highlight kind="normal">      mask = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>) 1 &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2663"><Highlight kind="normal">      n--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2664"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2665"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2666"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2667"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2668"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2669"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2670"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Shift a bignum left Count bits in-place. Shifted in bits are zero. There are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2671"><Highlight kind="comment">/// no restrictions on Count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2672" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd8fe361c9d102eb08cf77f6e4bfda4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd8fe361c9d102eb08cf77f6e4bfda4">APInt::tcShiftLeft</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;Dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Words, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t bother performing a no-op shift.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2674"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2675"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2676"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WordShift is the inter-part shift; BitShift is the intra-part shift.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2678"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordShift = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>, Words);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitShift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2680"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2681"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fastpath for moving by whole words.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BitShift == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2683"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::memmove(Dst + WordShift, Dst, (Words - WordShift) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2684"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2685"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Words-- &gt; WordShift) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2686"><Highlight kind="normal">      Dst&#91;Words&#93; = Dst&#91;Words - WordShift&#93; &lt;&lt; BitShift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Words &gt; WordShift)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><Highlight kind="normal">        Dst&#91;Words&#93; |=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><Highlight kind="normal">          Dst&#91;Words - WordShift - 1&#93; &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - BitShift);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fill in the remainder with 0s.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memset(Dst, 0, WordShift &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Shift a bignum right Count bits in-place. Shifted in bits are zero. There</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are no restrictions on Count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b">APInt::tcShiftRight</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;Dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Words, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t bother performing a no-op shift.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2701"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2702"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2703"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2704"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WordShift is the inter-part shift; BitShift is the intra-part shift.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2705"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordShift = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>, Words);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2706"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitShift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2707"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2708"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordsToMove = Words - WordShift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fastpath for moving by whole words.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2710"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BitShift == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2711"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::memmove(Dst, Dst + WordShift, WordsToMove &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2712"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2713"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != WordsToMove; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2714"><Highlight kind="normal">      Dst&#91;i&#93; = Dst&#91;i + WordShift&#93; &gt;&gt; BitShift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2715"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (i + 1 != WordsToMove)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2716"><Highlight kind="normal">        Dst&#91;i&#93; |= Dst&#91;i + WordShift + 1&#93; &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - BitShift);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2717"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2718"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2719"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2720"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fill in the remainder with 0s.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2721"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memset(Dst + WordsToMove, 0, WordShift &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2722"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2723"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2724"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Comparison (unsigned) of two bignums.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2725" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9">APInt::tcCompare</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2726"><Highlight kind="normal">                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2727"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (parts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2728"><Highlight kind="normal">    parts--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2729"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhs&#91;parts&#93; != rhs&#91;parts&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2730"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhs&#91;parts&#93; &gt; rhs&#91;parts&#93;) ? 1 : -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2731"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2732"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2733"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2734"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#ab9e94d7f7d74b11670e87904ed30dc2a"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#ab9e94d7f7d74b11670e87904ed30dc2a">llvm::APIntOps::SolveQuadraticEquationWrap</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2786"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RangeWidth) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2787"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CoeffWidth = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth();</Highlight></CodeLine>
