<Link id="l02790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2790"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Value range width should be less than coefficient width&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2791"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RangeWidth &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Value range bit width should be &gt; 1&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2792"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2793"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;: solving &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;x^2 + &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2794"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;x + &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, rw:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; RangeWidth &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2795"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2796"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Identify 0 as a (non)solution immediately.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2797"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.sextOrTrunc(RangeWidth).isZero()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2798"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;: zero solution\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2799"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(CoeffWidth, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2800"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2801"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2802"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The result of APInt arithmetic has the same bit width as the operands,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2803"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so it can actually lose high bits. A product of two n-bit integers needs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2n-1 bits to represent the full value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2805"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The operation done below (on quadratic coefficients) that can produce</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2806"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the largest value is the evaluation of the equation during bisection,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which needs 3 times the bitwidth of the coefficient, so the total number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2808"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of required bits is 3n.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2809"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2810"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The purpose of this extension is to simulate the set Z of all integers,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where n+1 &gt; n for all n in Z. In Z it makes sense to talk about positive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and negative numbers (not so much in a modulo arithmetic). The method</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used to solve the equation is based on the standard formula for real</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// numbers, and uses the concepts of &quot;positive&quot; and &quot;negative&quot; with their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// usual meanings.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><Highlight kind="normal">  CoeffWidth &#42;= 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.sext(CoeffWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2818"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.sext(CoeffWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2819"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.sext(CoeffWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2820"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2821"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make A &gt; 0 for simplicity. Negate cannot overflow at this point because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2822"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the bit width has increased.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2823"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.isNegative()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2824"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.negate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2825"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.negate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2826"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.negate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2827"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2828"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Solving an equation q(x) = 0 with coefficients in modular arithmetic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is really solving a set of equations q(x) = kR for k = 0, 1, 2, ...,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and R = 2^BitWidth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we&#39;re trying not only to find exact solutions, but also values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that &quot;wrap around&quot;, such a set will always have a solution, i.e. an x</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2834"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that satisfies at least one of the equations, or such that |q(x)|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// exceeds kR, while |q(x-1)| for the same k does not.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2836"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2837"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to find a value k, such that Ax^2 + Bx + C = kR will have a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2838"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// positive solution n (in the above sense), and also such that the n</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2839"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be the least among all solutions corresponding to k = 0, 1, ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2840"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (more precisely, the least element in the set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2841"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#123; n(k) | k is such that a solution n(k) exists &#125;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2842"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2843"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consider the parabola (over real numbers) that corresponds to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2844"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// quadratic equation. Since A &gt; 0, the arms of the parabola will point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2845"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// up. Picking different values of k will shift it up and down by R.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to shift the parabola in such a way as to reduce the problem</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2848"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of solving q(x) = kR to solving shifted&#95;q(x) = 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (The interesting solutions are the ceilings of the real number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// solutions.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> R = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aec662ee6ab1490a4cabebf2812e5b9ca">APInt::getOneBitSet</a>(CoeffWidth, RangeWidth);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> TwoA = 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> SqrB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PickLow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RoundUp = &#91;&#93; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.isStrictlyPositive());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = V.abs().urem(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.isZero())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V.isNegative() ? V+<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> : V+(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The vertex of the parabola is at -B/2A, but since A &gt; 0, it&#39;s negative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iff B is positive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.isNonNegative()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If B &gt;= 0, the vertex it at a negative location (or at 0), so in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order to have a non-negative solution we need to pick k that makes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C-kR negative. To satisfy all the requirements for the solution</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we are looking for, it needs to be closest to 0 of all k.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.srem(R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2872"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isStrictlyPositive())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> -= R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pick the greater solution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875"><Highlight kind="normal">    PickLow = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If B &lt; 0, the vertex is at a positive location. For any solution</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to exist, the discriminant must be non-negative. This means that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C-kR &lt;= B^2/4A is a necessary condition for k, i.e. there is a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lower bound on values of k: kR &gt;= C - B^2/4A.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> LowkR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> - SqrB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a05d674becc60ba4ef8cd4dd4d38ac27a">udiv</a>(2&#42;TwoA); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// udiv because all values &gt; 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round LowkR up (towards +inf) to the nearest kR.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><Highlight kind="normal">    LowkR = RoundUp(LowkR, R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there exists k meeting the condition above, and such that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C-kR &gt; 0, there will be two positive real number solutions of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// q(x) = kR. Out of all such values of k, pick the one that makes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C-kR closest to 0, (i.e. pick maximum k such that C-kR &gt; 0).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In other words, find maximum k such that LowkR &lt;= kR &lt; C.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.sgt(LowkR)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2891"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If LowkR &lt; C, then such a k is guaranteed to exist because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2892"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LowkR itself is a multiple of R.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> -= -RoundUp(-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, R);      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C = C - RoundDown(C, R)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2894"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pick the smaller solution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><Highlight kind="normal">      PickLow = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If C-kR &lt; 0 for all potential k&#39;s, it means that one solution</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be negative, while the other will be positive. The positive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// solution will shift towards 0 if the parabola is moved up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pick the kR closest to the lower bound (i.e. make C-kR closest</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to 0, or in other words, out of all parabolas that have solutions,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pick the one that is the farthest &quot;up&quot;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2903"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since LowkR is itself a multiple of R, simply take C-LowkR.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2904"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> -= LowkR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2905"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pick the greater solution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2906"><Highlight kind="normal">      PickLow = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2907"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2908"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2909"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2910"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;: updated coefficients &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;x^2 + &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2911"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;x + &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, rw:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; RangeWidth &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = SqrB - 4&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2914"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.isNonNegative() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Negative discriminant&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> SQ = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.sqrt();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Q = SQ &#42; SQ;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2918"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InexactSQ = Q != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The calculated SQ may actually be greater than the exact (non-integer)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value. If that&#39;s the case, decrement SQ to get a value that is lower.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3d430216d32f4363e4df154599b98055">sgt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><Highlight kind="normal">    SQ -= 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Rem;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SQ is rounded down (i.e SQ &#42; SQ &lt;= D), so the roots may be inexact.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When using the quadratic formula directly, the calculated low root</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may be greater than the exact one, since we would be subtracting SQ.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To make sure that the calculated root is not greater than the exact</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one, subtract SQ+1 when calculating the low root (for inexact value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of SQ).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PickLow)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a24187c2e178af0df22dac26cd5229294">APInt::sdivrem</a>(-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> - (SQ+InexactSQ), TwoA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, Rem);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a24187c2e178af0df22dac26cd5229294">APInt::sdivrem</a>(-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> + SQ, TwoA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, Rem);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The updated coefficients should be such that the (exact) solution is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// positive. Since APInt division rounds towards 0, the calculated one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can be 0, but cannot be negative.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.isNonNegative() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Solution should be non-negative&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InexactSQ &amp;&amp; Rem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((SQ&#42;SQ).sle(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SQ = |&#95;sqrt(D)&#95;|, so SQ&#42;SQ &lt;= D&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2949"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The exact value of the square root of D should be between SQ and SQ+1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This implies that the solution should be between that corresponding to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2951"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SQ (i.e. X) and that corresponding to SQ+1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The calculated X cannot be greater than the exact (real) solution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2954"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Actually it must be strictly less than the exact solution, while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X+1 will be greater than or equal to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3024" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a126453035cc98d97d01233bc532b32aa"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a126453035cc98d97d01233bc532b32aa">llvm::StoreIntToMemory</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;IntVal, uint8&#95;t &#42;Dst,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3025"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StoreBytes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3026"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((IntVal.getBitWidth()+7)/8 &gt;= StoreBytes &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Integer too small!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3027"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;Src = (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;)IntVal.getRawData();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3028"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3029"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a4ee2015697caec796e59972aadc2f9e2">sys::IsLittleEndianHost</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3030"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Little-endian host - the source is ordered from LSB to MSB.  Order the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3031"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// destination from LSB to MSB: Do a straight copy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3032"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(Dst, Src, StoreBytes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3033"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3034"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Big-endian host - the source is an array of 64 bit words ordered from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3035"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LSW to MSW.  Each word is ordered from MSB to LSB.  Order the destination</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3036"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from MSB to LSB: Reverse the word order, but not the bytes in a word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3037"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoreBytes &gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3038"><Highlight kind="normal">      StoreBytes -= </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3039"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// May not be aligned so use memcpy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3040"><Highlight kind="normal">      memcpy(Dst + StoreBytes, Src, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3041"><Highlight kind="normal">      Src += </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3042"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3043"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3044"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(Dst, Src + </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t) - StoreBytes, StoreBytes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3045"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3046"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3047"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3048"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LoadIntFromMemory - Loads the integer stored in the LoadBytes bytes starting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3049"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from Src into IntVal, which is assumed to be wide enough and to hold zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3050" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af6d662507305e17aef5ce4361a349ad8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af6d662507305e17aef5ce4361a349ad8">llvm::LoadIntFromMemory</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;IntVal, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;Src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3051"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadBytes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3052"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((IntVal.getBitWidth()+7)/8 &gt;= LoadBytes &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Integer too small!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3053"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t &#42;Dst = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint8&#95;t &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3054"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(IntVal.getRawData()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3055"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3056"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a4ee2015697caec796e59972aadc2f9e2">sys::IsLittleEndianHost</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3057"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Little-endian host - the destination must be ordered from LSB to MSB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3058"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The source is ordered from LSB to MSB: Do a straight copy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3059"><Highlight kind="normal">    memcpy(Dst, Src, LoadBytes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3060"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3061"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Big-endian - the destination is an array of 64 bit words ordered from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3062"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LSW to MSW.  Each word must be ordered from MSB to LSB.  The source is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3063"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ordered from MSB to LSB: Reverse the word order, but not the bytes in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3064"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3065"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoadBytes &gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3066"><Highlight kind="normal">      LoadBytes -= </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3067"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// May not be aligned so use memcpy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3068"><Highlight kind="normal">      memcpy(Dst, Src + LoadBytes, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3069"><Highlight kind="normal">      Dst += </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3070"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
